claim: Geoffrey Beevers has yet to have any affiliation with the Orange Tree Theatre.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Beevers has worked extensively at the Orange Tree Theatre in Richmond upon Thames , both as an actor  (  including the title role in Jules Romain 's Doctor Knock , 1994  )  ; and as an adaptor/director of George Eliot 's novel Adam Bede  (  February 1990  )  , for which he won a Time Out Award , and Honoré de Balzac 's Père Goriot  (  February 1994  )  .
